name: wasm-dummy
description: wasm/emscripten with typescript and npm bundling test

scripts.build-wasm: bin/install_emscripten.sh && cd wasm && ./build.sh && cd .. && node bin/wrap_wasm.js
scripts.bundle: tsc --project tsconfig.json && node lib/emwasm/cli.js lib/*.wasm.js && webpack
scripts.clean: rm -rf lib dist src/wasm.ts wasm/*.wasm wasm/settings.json
scripts.build: npm run build-wasm && npm run tsc && npm run bundle

author: Joerg Breitbart <j.breitbart@netzkolchose.de>
